content: I think I'll try out OBS Studio first, since it's free and has a large community of users and plugins available. I've heard that it's also very customizable, which is important for me since I want to create a unique look for my YouTube channel. Plus, it's good to know that it's well-optimized for my NVIDIA GeForce RTX 3080 and AMD Ryzen 9 5900X. Do you have any tips for getting started with OBS Studio?
